s: I recently purchased the LG Ultrafine 5k monitor for my 2018 MBP. It works perfectly. I also have a work laptop that is HP Elitebook 830 G6. The original cable from the monitor, the Thunderbolt 3 allows both laptops to work for the monitor. Once I am off work, I plug in my personal computer.
